remarks: An upper bound for the limit of a real infinite series.  This theorem can also be used to compare two infinite series.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Mar-2014.)
statement:
cvgcmp.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
cvgcmp.2 $e |- ( ph -> N e. Z ) $.
cvgcmp.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. RR ) $.
cvgcmp.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( G ` k ) e. RR ) $.
cvgcmpub.5 $e |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) ~~> A ) $.
cvgcmpub.6 $e |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , G ) ~~> B ) $.
cvgcmpub.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( G ` k ) <_ ( F ` k ) ) $.
cvgcmpub $p |- ( ph -> B <_ A ) $.
$d F k $.
$d G k $.
$d M k $.
$d N k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
